Room.Name: A dark shrouded trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a sparsely traveled trail. Foliage overwealms the trail. Lucious green vines, and shrubs. The strong scent of pine and spruce fill the air. The grass is beaten down to the north.

Room.Name: A dark shrouded trail
Room.Description: You find yourself on a sparsely traveled trail. Foliage overwealms the trail. Lucious green vines, and shrubs. The strong scent of pine and spruce fill the air. The grass is beaten down to the south and north.

Room.Name: A dark clearing
Room.Description: You stumble out of the forest to an astonishing sight. All the vibrant plant life around has been killed. Dead clumps of rotting plants lays scattered around. Huge orcs stumble around in the open field. Attending to the duty of their master. You can barely stomach the strong smell of sulfur in the air.

Room.Name: Within the fields
Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Name: Within the fields
Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Name: Within the fields
Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Name: Center of the field
Room.Description: You find yourself in the center of the field. All about you is scorched earth. A hopeless place of pure evil. The stench of sulfur is strongest right here. The ground is scratched downward. As if some beast tried to dig its way to freedom, and failed.

Room.Name: Within the fields
Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Name: Within the fields
Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Name: Within the fields
Room.Description: You find yourself hopelessly trapped in the fields. The clattering sound of metal being thrashed together can be heard all throughout the field. Orc's, Huge Orc's, Stumble all around you. Mindlessly attending to their duties.

Room.Name: Beneath the field
Room.Description: You have finally left the field behind. You find yourself deep within some sort of catacombs. It is extremely hard to see. The only light source are the magical torches hovering next to the wall. Strange sounds creep out from the tunnels northward.

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

Room.Name: Chamber of the Dreadlord
Room.Description: You get the notion you shouldn't have stumbled in here. The room lights up suddenly by a huge fire. The monster before you is something you haven't seen before. The entire ground shudders as it lands before you. Extending its claw in challenge.

Room.Name: Room of the fallen templar
Room.Description: Blinding light strikes you with force. It is hard to make out anything except the faint shape of a being in the back of the room. The room smells of rotting corpses, and for some odd reason it has a faint scent of a rose. The kind the templars of old use to lay upon their enemies corpses.

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

Room.Name: Within the catacombs
Room.Description: All around you the crudely tunneled caverns extend. The ground is moist with blood. Nearly turning it into mud. It's hard to move. Especially with the strong smell of death creeping up all around you. The air is cold as it blows up against you. Yet your underground. How is this possible?

NPC.name: orc warrior powerful
NPC.description: Adorned in armor you have never seen before. A crest of a black rose with a single thorn sits proudly engraved into his helm. A mystical fire seems to burn around it. He peers at you with distaste, and seems to beg you to strike.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful orc warrior stands here, mindlessly attending to his tasks.

NPC.name: dread lord dreadlord
NPC.description: A massive being to say the least. His eyes flicker with hatred. His body is adorned in a very fine chainmail. It doesn't look to be forged of this world. You suddenly have an impulse to turn and run.
NPC.longDescription: The dark dreadlord stands before you, claw extended in challenge.

NPC.name: orc general
NPC.description: This huge orc commands respect to all around him. His piercing red eyes gleam with bloodlust. Even through his armor you can see the muscles expand and contract to overwealming proportions. Pity anyone whom would wish to attack this massive specimen.
NPC.longDescription: The orc general stands here, yelling harsh words to his warriors.

NPC.name: fallen templar
NPC.description: Once a proud and noble knight of the clothe. His will gave to Lord Ceial. Now he is to stay in the catacombs for all of eternity in punishment by the Dark Lord himself. The reason is unkown. Yet that is the way of Ceial.
NPC.longDescription: The fallen templar stands here clutching his shield tightly.

Item.Name: helm crest black rose thorn helmet
Item.ShortDescription: a helm engraved with a black rose with a single thorn
Item.LongDescription: A helm engraved with a black rose with a single thorn lays here untouched.

Item.Name: sword of devotion
Item.LongDescription: A dark sword pulsates from the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil AntiGood NoRemove Unholy

Item.Name: breastplate breast plate rose thorn
Item.ShortDescription: a breastplate adorned with a black rose
Item.LongDescription: A breasplate baring a black rose lays here.

Item.Name: a key of earth
Item.LongDescription: A dark key lays here, undisturbed.

Item.Name: bracer of dread
Item.LongDescription: A dark bracer lays here untouched.

Item.Name: scroll of despair
Item.LongDescription: A dark scroll lays here emiting hatred.

Item.Name: shield fallen templar
Item.ShortDescription: the Shield of the Fallen Templar
Item.LongDescription: A dark shield lays here untouched.
